title: I want to wear it too!
detail_text: <:th_ch0202/>Nozomi-senpai, Nozomi-senpai! There’s something I wanted to ask….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>What is it, Kasumin?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>If I were to wear a Miko outfit, how would you find it….?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Eh? What’s this all of the sudden? Do you want to try wearing one?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>You’ll let me wear it!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Wah, what a cheerful voice~. Are you that happy?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Th-, that’s not...entirely untrue….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Alright then! Nozomi-senpai will dress you up real cute~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Please make me absolutely absolutely cute! Well, Kasumin in a Miko outfit will of course be cute though!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
